title: Introducing: Tenterhook
body:
Archie Faulks AKA [Tenterhook](https://www.

facebook.com/tenterhookband?fref=ts) won the [Song Academy’s](http://www.songacademy.co.uk/young-songwriter-2013/) Young Songwriter competition last year within the 13-18 year old category. His first track, Blackfire, is “about a girl whose love possesses all the danger of fire but without the main ingredient, light”. His second tune, _Stereo_, delicately mixes Archie’s mature (classically-trained) voice with perfectly placed piano. Being a self-taught pianist, guitarist and drummer he most definitely has a lot more to offer in and beyond 2014…
